|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [app](./obsidian.view.app.md) |  | [App](./obsidian.app.md) |  |
|  [containerEl](./obsidian.view.containerel.md) |  | HTMLElement |  |
|  [icon](./obsidian.view.icon.md) |  | IconName |  |
|  [leaf](./obsidian.view.leaf.md) |  | [WorkspaceLeaf](./obsidian.workspaceleaf.md) |  |
|  [navigation](./obsidian.view.navigation.md) |  | boolean | Whether or not the view is intended for navigation. If your view is a static view that is not intended to be navigated away, set this to false. (For example: File explorer, calendar, etc.) If your view opens a file or can be otherwise navigated, set this to true. (For example: Markdown editor view, Kanban view, PDF view, etc.) |
